resources.name: Skill
resources.description: Skills describe the capabilities and characteristics of your vampire. They indicate what your vampire can do and what they might do.

resources.name: Mark
resources.description: A Mark is a visible indication of your vampireâ€™s undying state, or any other thing that sets them apart from mortal people.

resources.name: Character
resources.description: Characters are the people with whom your vampire has a relationship

resources.name: Resource
resources.description: Resources are assets or structures that are useful to your vampire, or items that they value.

entries.message:
In your blood-hunger you destroy someone close to you.Kill a mortal [character]. Create a mortal if none
 are available. Take the [skill] "Bloodthirsty".
You are overcome by panic and maul someone close to you accidentally turning them into a monster like yourself. Convert a beloved mortal Character into an enemy immortal. Take the Skill "Ashamed"

You are captured and enslaved by a wicked and powerful super natural entity. Create an immortal Character. How do you eventually escape their servitude? Check a Skill and take the Skill "Humans are Cattle". Strike out all mortal Characters, as a hundred years have passed. Take a Resource you have used for evil while in service to your former master.
